definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: In winter I use an electric blanket.
The utility model belongs to the electric heating electrical appliance of daily use industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型屬於一種電熱電器日用工業品。

sentences.english: Like the time he brought home the electric range.
sentences.chinese: 就像當初爸爸爲家裏買電熱爐具的時候。
成套電熱真空成型組件。

sentences.english: This paper presents a way of software integration of VXI measure control system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了電熱化學炮VXI測控系統的集成技術。

sentences.english: Methods An electric hand warmer was transformed and tests were made many times with different movement temperature of thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 改造電熱暖手爐，用不同動作溫度的溫控器多次測試。

sentences.english: One of them is to use an electric fire starter.
sentences.chinese: 他們中的一個人是用一個電熱爐生火。

sentences.english: Heating is ensured by assembling electric heating toils in spaces allocated.
sentences.chinese: 並且通過在指定的地方安裝電熱網保證熱量供應。

sentences.english: A small electric heater can heat an entire room.
sentences.chinese: 一個小電熱器能夠把整個房間變熱。

sentences.english: He helped his grandmother turn on the electric blanket when they were about to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺的時候，他幫奶奶打開了電熱毯。

sentences.english: Don't expose it to hot objects to prevent wielding slag from spilling on ribbon heater.
sentences.chinese: 不要與高溫物體接觸，防止電焊熔渣濺落到電熱帶上。

sentences.english: A novel electro-thermal actuator is presented by using non-silicon micro fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種由非硅微加工技術製作的電熱微驅動器。

sentences.english: Methods With the methods of water floatation and Tullgren to isolated mites.
sentences.chinese: 方法清水漂浮法和塔氏電熱集蟎器法。

sentences.english: We develop and produce electric kettle recent years on the base of current mature manage structure .
sentences.chinese: 在成熟的基礎上，本司近年開發了電熱水壺。

sentences.english: Used on Air conditioning, Refrigeration, Heating, Lighting and other applications.
sentences.chinese: 專業使用在冷氣，冰箱，電熱，照明設備方面之行業。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an electrothermal wine warming kettle which belongs to the field of an individual and domestic article.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型電熱溫酒壺屬個人及家庭用品領域。
